Curation and Discovery

A Little About Me

⧉ infominer - November 28, 2019

I became captivated with computers in the early ’90s, as the world wide web began to emerge. I was a total computer nerd, but never took it seriously. I had no conception of how the world would be transformed, and ultimately decided that technology was simply one of many potential material pursuits. I took off to pursue meaning, which landed me off-grid for a bulk of the time. After a decade of indolence, I needed a re-boot.

Reflections: Stepping Back and Moving Forward

⧉ infominer - November 19, 2019

Note: Repost from SourceCrypto, with an infohub subscriptions form. In the Summer of 2018, I had a seemingly foolish idea. I decided that I should try and organize all the types of information surrounding Bitcoin, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency. I began doing so, creating channels for a variety of topics I began collecting links in a discord server, for eventul addition to a database of some sort.

InfoHub Transformed

⧉ infominer - June 15, 2019

Welcome !!! This site began as a few markdown files in a github repository, and gradually became my homepage. I have a wide range of interests that deserve the room to grow as distinct projects, and it’s good practice for me to create new sites. So, this summer, I decided to break apart my web-content to various domains and github organizations. The purpose is to develop distinct concentrated informational resources on a diverse range of topics.
